# AI Discoverability Templates

Ready-to-use templates for generating AI discoverability artifacts.

## robots.txt Templates

### Basic (All Projects)
```
# robots.txt for {PROJECT_NAME}
# Generated by Sprint Management Framework

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Exclude sensitive paths
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /__pycache__/

# Sitemap
Sitemap: {BASE_URL}/sitemap.xml
```

### Web Application
```
# robots.txt for {PROJECT_NAME}
# Generated by Sprint Management Framework

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/internal/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /private/

# AI Crawlers
User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /docs/
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /api/public/

User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

Sitemap: {BASE_URL}/sitemap.xml
```

### API Only
```
# robots.txt for {PROJECT_NAME} API
# Generated by Sprint Management Framework

User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# Allow documentation
User-agent: *
Allow: /docs/
Allow: /openapi.yaml
Allow: /.well-known/

# AI Crawlers for API docs
User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /docs/
Allow: /openapi.yaml

User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /docs/
Allow: /openapi.yaml
```

---

## sitemap.xml Template

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
  <!-- Homepage -->
  <url>
    <loc>{BASE_URL}/</loc>
    <lastmod>{DATE}</lastmod>
    <changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
    <priority>1.0</priority>
  </url>
  
  <!-- Documentation -->
  <url>
    <loc>{BASE_URL}/docs/</loc>
    <lastmod>{DATE}</lastmod>
    <changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
    <priority>0.9</priority>
  </url>
  
  <!-- Getting Started -->
  <url>
    <loc>{BASE_URL}/docs/getting-started/</loc>
    <lastmod>{DATE}</lastmod>
    <changefreq>monthly</changefreq>
    <priority>0.8</priority>
  </url>
  
  <!-- API Reference -->
  <url>
    <loc>{BASE_URL}/docs/api/</loc>
    <lastmod>{DATE}</lastmod>
    <changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
    <priority>0.8</priority>
  </url>
  
  <!-- Add more URLs as needed -->
</urlset>
```

---

## schema.org Templates

### Software Project
```html
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "SoftwareSourceCode",
  "name": "{PROJECT_NAME}",
  "description": "{PROJECT_DESCRIPTION}",
  "codeRepository": "{REPO_URL}",
  "programmingLanguage": "{LANGUAGE}",
  "runtimePlatform": "{RUNTIME}",
  "author": {
    "@type": "{AUTHOR_TYPE}",
    "name": "{AUTHOR_NAME}",
    "url": "{AUTHOR_URL}"
  },
  "license": "{LICENSE_URL}",
  "dateCreated": "{CREATED_DATE}",
  "dateModified": "{MODIFIED_DATE}"
}
</script>
```

### API Service
```html
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "WebAPI",
  "name": "{API_NAME}",
  "description": "{API_DESCRIPTION}",
  "documentation": "{DOCS_URL}",
  "termsOfService": "{TOS_URL}",
  "provider": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "{ORG_NAME}",
    "url": "{ORG_URL}"
  }
}
</script>
```

---

## ai-plugin.json Template

```json
{
  "schema_version": "v1",
  "name_for_human": "{PROJECT_NAME}",
  "name_for_model": "{PROJECT_SLUG}",
  "description_for_human": "{SHORT_DESCRIPTION}",
  "description_for_model": "{DETAILED_DESCRIPTION_FOR_AI}",
  "auth": {
    "type": "none"
  },
  "api": {
    "type": "openapi",
    "url": "{BASE_URL}/openapi.yaml"
  },
  "logo_url": "{BASE_URL}/logo.png",
  "contact_email": "{CONTACT_EMAIL}",
  "legal_info_url": "{BASE_URL}/legal"
}
```

---

## openapi.yaml Template

```yaml
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: {API_NAME}
  description: |
    {API_DESCRIPTION}
    
    This API provides access to {MAIN_FEATURES}.
    
    ## Authentication
    {AUTH_DESCRIPTION}
    
    ## Rate Limits
    {RATE_LIMIT_INFO}
  version: {VERSION}
  contact:
    name: API Support
    email: {CONTACT_EMAIL}
    url: {SUPPORT_URL}
  license:
    name: {LICENSE_NAME}
    url: {LICENSE_URL}

servers:
  - url: {API_BASE_URL}
    description: Production server

tags:
  - name: {TAG_NAME}
    description: {TAG_DESCRIPTION}

paths:
  /{resource}:
    get:
      tags:
        - {TAG_NAME}
      summary: List {resources}
      description: |
        Retrieves a paginated list of {resources}.
        
        Use this endpoint to browse available {resources}.
      operationId: list{Resources}
      parameters:
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: Page number for pagination
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            default: 1
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: Number of items per page
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 100
            default: 20
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/{Resource}List'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalError'

components:
  schemas:
    {Resource}:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Unique identifier
        name:
          type: string
          description: Display name
        created_at:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          description: Creation timestamp
    
    {Resource}List:
      type: object
      properties:
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/{Resource}'
        total:
          type: integer
          description: Total number of items
        page:
          type: integer
          description: Current page
        limit:
          type: integer
          description: Items per page
    
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
  
  responses:
    BadRequest:
      description: Bad request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    
    InternalError:
      description: Internal server error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
```

---

## MCP Server Template

See MCP-GUIDE.md for complete MCP server scaffolding templates.

---

## Variable Reference

| Variable | Description | Example |
|----------|-------------|---------|
| {PROJECT_NAME} | Human-readable name | "My Project" |
| {PROJECT_SLUG} | URL-safe identifier | "my-project" |
| {BASE_URL} | Base URL with protocol | "https://example.com" |
| {API_BASE_URL} | API base URL | "https://api.example.com/v1" |
| {DATE} | Current date | "2024-01-15" |
| {VERSION} | Semantic version | "1.0.0" |
| {CONTACT_EMAIL} | Contact email | "support@example.com" |
| {REPO_URL} | Repository URL | "https://github.com/org/repo" |
